newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Three West Bank Arabs killed, 2-day toll at 13.
newsitem.headline: Three West Bank Arabs killed, 2-day toll at 13.

text.p: Three Palestinians were shot dead in clashes with Israeli troops on Thursday in the West Bank, raising the death toll in two days of bloodshed to 13 Palestinians, hospital officials said.

An official at Ramallah hospital said three people had been confirmed dead among several critically wounded. It was the first report of any dead in the West Bank on Thursday. In Gaza Strip clashes, health officials said five Palestinians were killed.
